attributes.action: automaticly deport imigrant criminals on second offence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the government say that our prisons are full but seem to have no realistic answere to the problem. one good first step would be to automaticly deport imigrants that break the law for the second time. we let imans preach hate. we have terrorists living here planning our downfall while claiming social security. we currently have Russian gangs that the police are powerless againced. we have far too many people walking into our country and abusing our kindness. its time to put an end to it, will you please suport me on this? ask friends to suport me too. this is not just for us! this is for our childrens future.
